name: rexeqOLD
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ rexeq as of 5-May-2023. Equality theorem for restricted existential quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
